description: Performs a forward DNS lookup to resolve a hostname to its first IPv4 address, or to the first record of a specified DNS record type as second parameter.
Performs a forward DNS lookup to resolve a hostname to all its IPv4 addresses, or to all records of a specified DNS record type second parameter.
Performs a reverse DNS lookup to resolve an IPv4 address given as a parameter to a hostname.
Updates the DNS resolver configuration for all subsequent DNS queries.
Queries all TXT records for a hostname and returns them as a table with one row per TXT record.
